name: Alien Droid [JAM]
description:
//

Objective is simple:

Collect 100 coins before you pass the level

how to play?

A - Jump

S - Run

Z - change the direction of the projectile (Diagonal up, Straight, Gravity or Bomb) 

X - Shoot

types of items:

Coins:    your goal in the game

Super Coins:   gives the player 10 coins (hidden item)

blue Diamond: projectile

green Diamond: increases the amount of projectiles that can be fired

Star: lives

credits:

Muscic:

3xBlast  for OpenGameArt.org
